resources.string:
"\u0009Благодарим вас за выбор мобильных устройств Lenovo! Перед использованием плана улучшения пользовательского опыта с мобильными устройствами Lenovo, вы должны тщательно прочитать следующие условия: \u0009We will provide the mobile communication network/Internet based online data center related services in accordance with this user experience improvement plan (this plan). In this plan, all the information, functions, contents, software, hardware or services provided directly by us are collectively referred to as Services.The plan is signed by you and Beijing Legend Tiaopin Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as we or our company). Depending on the context, in this plan, we may sometimes include our suppliers, service providers, customers or employees. Any reference to you shall mean any entity or individual who agrees to join or use this service. 1. \u0009Service definition and description User experience improvement plan is a service function we proposed for Lenovo mobile devices, which is designed to enhance the products or services and improve the user experience. After enabling the User experience improvement plan function in your mobile device, you can have the priority to experience the new services of User experience improvement plan while using the original functions of your mobile devices:
\u0009Enhanced device hardware and software acceleration function and personalized experience (1) Speed up the boot process and save your boot time to provide you with a better boot experience; (2) Provide you with the most popular software function experience. These functions are simple, easy to use and considerate; (3) Enhanced GPS positioning function, providing faster and more accurate GPS positioning functions; (4) Intelligent recognition and switching functions of 3G, WLAN and other network modes provide personalized services in different network environments. This largely save your 3G network traffic and costs while you enjoy the services;
\u0009Multi-faceted, personalized content recommendation service: (1) When you are playing games, we will provide you with the latest game download links and information that you may be interested in; (2) When you are listening to music, we will provide you with information on recent activities, concerts and popular new songs of related singers; (3) When you are trying to use mobile offices, we will provide you with the latest and most popular office software and experience; (4) When you are surfing the Web, we will provide you with safe and fast access experience, and recommend the latest software, games, news, ebooks, music, videos and other personalized content services and multimedia audio-visual entertainment that you may be interested in; (5) When you are positioning navigation, in addition to the more accurate and efficient GPS positioning functions, we will also provide you with food, clothing and shelter recommendations and retrieval services based on location information;
\u0009Safe and reliable software and service experiences; (1) Through the grading and scoring mechanism for software, we will provide you with many types of built-in software which are more secure; (2) Considerate one-stop application retrieve, download, install and uninstall services, letting you experience the most popular software and games immediately; (3) Build personal cloud storage services for you; Let you share information between phones, computers, pads and even multimedia televisions of compatible formats anywhere, and you will no longer need to worry about missing your files. You shall clearly understand and acknowledge that we only offer one convenient service. In other words, this service only provides you with the optimization, enhancement or personalization assistance based on your mobile device's existing functions. Specific services and contents may be provided by other third parties. We will not provide you with services and specific information content which shall be provided by their providers. We will not provide any warranties for services and information content provided by any third parties, including but not limited to warranties for the security, reliability, timeliness and applicability of such information content. If you have any questions, objections, comments or suggestions on such information content, you shall contact the providers and consult with them. We do not assume any responsibility to you on this. We reserve the rights to adjust the service content and service method as needed (including but not limited to the terms of service), and these adjusted contents or services or overview and/or function description based on them will be the effective part of this agreement. We will make reasonable business efforts to inform you. While you enjoy the services, you shall check and see the modified contents in time and follow them. We may use technology or other measures to protect the services, ensure that the services comply with relevant laws and regulations and policy requirements, protect our suppliers, customers and employees, or prevent you from violating this plan. These measures may include but not limited to the control of your use of this service. These measures may prevent or interrupt your use of this service.
2. \u0009How to obtain the service To obtain this service, you shall: (a) Make sure your mobile device has been connected to mobile communication network/Internet and the network connection is smooth; (b) Open the function modules corresponding to the service, such as push service, GPS, etc.; and (c) Sign the plan in accordance with the Article 3 of this plan. If you meet the above conditions, then you can use this service in accordance with this plan.
3. \u0009Sign a plan \u0009 You must accept to sign the terms and conditions of this plan before you can use this service. When you sign this plan, you must reach the age of legal capacity as stipulated by applicable laws; if you are under such age of legal capacity, the signing of the plan must be completed by your parent or legal guardian. The following behaviors indicate that you understand and accept the terms and conditions of this plan: (a) You click on the I Agree or I Accept or similar buttons to confirm that you agree to or accept the online version of this plan; (b) You have signed the paper version of this plan with us; or (c) You have used this service (including any third party services provided together with this service). If you do not agree to the terms and conditions of this plan, please do not use this service.
4. \u0009Service period and service fee \u0009 At present, services under this agreement are free services, but we reserve the rights to charge you for these services in the future. If we plan to charge this service, we will notify you in advance about the fees. We may not provide this service to you within a specific period (service period) unless you pay the corresponding service fees in accordance with our requirements. We reserve the right to adjust the service fee at any time based on our actual situations. \u0009 The service fees do not include any fees incurred due to your access to Internet or mobile network. Whether the service is provided on a paid basis, any expenses (such as telephone bills, SMS bills, and fees incurred due to your access to other Internet services and online purchase of other applications, audio and video contents, services or products) payable to a third party (including network operators) due to your use of the service, shall be solely borne by yourself.
5. \u0009How to use this service When using this service, you shall: \u0009Comply with any applicable laws, including international treaties or conventions; \u0009Comply with all the plans, principles, provisions, procedures or notices related to this service; \u0009Immediately notify us of any illegal use of your Lenovo account or security bug in your account that you have become aware of;
6. \u0009Product Registration \u0009When your device is powered on for the first time, device information of your cell phone will be transmitted to Lenovo through available data service or WLAN network，which will happen only once. Usage of that information is limited to genuine product verification and post-sale services management, with the sole purpose to provide better service.
7. Usage of Data Service and Fees \u0009The registration process above and some functions of Lenovo cell phones will use data service or WLAN network as the default connection method. Lenovo will not charge you directly, but you may need to pay for Internet roaming, data transmission (e.g., picture upload), or other services, according to your service agreement with the Internet service providers. It becomes your responsibility to pay the ISPs.
8. \u0009Prohibitions When using this service, you shall not: \u0009Use this service to engage in any activities which may have an adverse effect on the normal operation of Internet or mobile networks; \u0009Use this service to infringe the intellectual property rights or any other legal rights or interests of any other persons; \u0009Use this service in such a manner that may impair the interests or reputation of us or our affiliates, dealers, distributors and/or suppliers (collectively referred to as we), or the interests or reputation of any customers thereof; Affiliates in this plan refer to the organizations controlled by us, under the same control of a third party as us, or controlling us. The organizations here refer to any companies, enterprises or other legal entities; and control means the ability to directly or indirectly affect the management of above-mentioned organizations, whether through ownership, voting shares, contracts or other methods. \u0009Engage in or promote any illegal activities by using or leveraging this service; \u0009Use any part of the service as a target link to any unsolicited bulk information or commercial information (junk emails); \u0009Access and/or use this service by using any automatic process or service; \u0009Use any unauthorized means to modify or reroute, or attempt to modify or reroute this service; \u0009Damage or destroy this service (or any network connected to this service) or make this service unworkable or being overloaded or disrupt the use and enjoyment of the service by any other parties; \u0009Resell or redistribute this service or any part of this service.
9. \u0009Consequence of breach \u0009If you breach any provisions of this plan when using this service, we reserve the rights to ask you to remedy such breach or directly take responsive measures, including but not limited to: (a) suspend the service provided to you; and/or (b) terminate the service provided to you, so as to minimize the influence of your misconduct. \u0009Any penalty, investigation, accusation, claims or demands resulted from or incurred due to your conduct shall be settled by you at your own expense; and any losses and liabilities arising therefrom shall be solely borne by you. \u0009You shall, at your own expense, defend and not hold us and our affiliates accountable (us includes our suppliers, customers or employees), against any penalty, investigation, accusation, claims or demands initiated by any third party against us (us includes our affiliates, suppliers, customers or employees) due to your conduct, immediately upon your receipt of our notice. In addition, we reserve the rights to claim against you for any losses sustained by us due to your conduct.
10. \u0009Service changes \u0009We may regularly or irregularly examine, repair, maintain and update the services' websites or relevant devices so as to better meet our customers' demands or update our products or perform technical improvement. For any suspension of the service for a reasonable period due to such reasons aforementioned, we promise to make reasonable efforts to inform you thereof in advance, and shall assume no responsibility for the inconvenience and losses caused by such reasons. In consideration of the particularity and unpredictability of Internet services, you agree that we may change, suspend or terminate this service at any time for any reasons. If possible, we will make commercially reasonable efforts to send you a prior notice of such change, suspension or termination, but shall not be obligated to send such notice. You can close the User experience improvement plan in the item Device settings at any time. After closing it, your mobile device will no longer interact with the server of this plan, and you can no longer use the corresponding functions and services. \u0009Upon the termination of the service for any reason, your rights to use the service will be terminated accordingly.
11. \u0009Intellectual property rights \u0009We or the third party have all the rights, ownerships or interests in or to the service or any part thereof or the software and any text, picture, graph, audio and/or video materials (materials) provided through or together with this service, including but not limited to all intellectual property rights. These materials are protected by laws on copyright, trademark and/or other property ownership. You agree not to modify, adapt, translate, produce derivative works from, decompile, reverse engineer or disassemble this service or materials provided through or together with this service, or attempt to derive source codes from the service or the materials in other ways, or extract a substantial part thereof for any other applications. You also agree not to remove, obscure or alter the copyright notice, trademark or other proprietary right notice by us or any third party attached to or contained in this service or accessed together with or through this service. Intellectual property rights means any and all rights available from time to time under patent laws, copyright laws, trade secret laws, trademark laws and anti-unfair competition laws and any and all other proprietary rights, and any and all applications therefor and renewals, extensions and restorations thereof, now or hereafter in force and effect worldwide. \u0009Unless otherwise expressly specified herein, nothing in this plan shall be construed as the assignment by a party to the other party of any copyright, patent, trade secret, trademark or other intellectual property rights held thereby.
12. \u0009Data collection and protection \u0009In order to collaborate and provide better services, if you participated in the User experience improvement plan, we will irregularly sync your mobile device operation data, including: equipment switch events, Push service switching events, WLAN switch events, GPS switch events and data, operator information, system function usage data, application startup/shutdown events, application installation/uninstallation events, device operation data (key features, exceptions, error data) and so on. \u0009The device operation data synchronized by User experience improvement plan are collected anonymously. \u0009Synchronized mobile device data will be unified, encrypted, and stored on a particular server and kept for a period less than one year. Such information will be protected in accordance with our privacy policy. \u0009You may read details of our privacy policy by visiting http://www.lenovo.com.cn/Public/public_bottom/privacy.shtml. \u0009And we may access, use or disclose your data and information only for the following purposes: (a) For the anonymous analysis of device running state and application function usage, in order to discover the problems when devices and applications are running; as the basis for improving products or service functions, improving user experiences and providing the services listed in Article 1 of this plan; (b) To comply with laws or assist in investigation or enforcement by a judicial and/or enforcement authority; (c) To protect our and our customers' property and legal rights, including the implementation of the plan and compliance with the policy applicable to this service; or (d) To protect the rights, properties and security of the public. However, there may be specific data leakage risks when you provide and transmit data through the network. You have fully considered and are willing to take the risk, so you hereby confirm that you will assume the responsibility for the consequences of data leakage caused by the network transmission. For such data leakage which is out of our control or not caused by our fault, and we shall not assume any responsibility.
13. \u0009Limited warranties \u0009We guarantee that we will provide this service in a professional manner consistent with the industry standards. You shall inform us of any inconsistency of this service provided by us with this warranty within ninety (90) days since this service is provided. \u0009You know and acknowledge that what we provide under this plan are services instead of goods. Therefore, we have made no warranty or representation with regard to this service other than above warranties, and hereby disclaim any other warranties or conditions (whether express or implied), including but not limited to those with respect to merchantability, applicability for a specific purpose and non-infringement. \u0009You understand that this service is provided based on continuously developing technologies and in reliance upon telecommunication, Internet and other third-party services, and therefore may fail to satisfy the users' demands due to disruption, delay or other problems occurred to this service, caused by unstable factors including but not limited to force majeure, computer virus or hacker attack, unstable system, user's location, user's device shutdown, or breakdown of GSM network, Internet, 3G network or other communication circuit. All of such risks shall be solely borne by the user who has enabled the service. We make no absolute warranty on the promptness, security or accuracy of the service and bear no liability for failure of timely and accurate storage, sending, receipt and reading of data, or any other similar problems caused by the reasons mentioned above. \u0009 You will decide whether to use this service at your sole discretion and bear any liabilities arising from such decision. \u0009If applicable laws prohibit the exclusion of some implied warranties by contracts, then to the greatest extent prohibited by such applicable laws, the above exclusion of implied warranties does not apply to you. And you may continue to enjoy the rights which are so prohibited to be excluded or restricted by contracts.
14. \u0009Limitation of liabilities \u0009If the service provided by us is inconsistent with the above warranty, we will make commercially reasonable efforts to correct the errors and provide the service again. If we are unable to materially correct any error therein in a commercially reasonable manner, you have the rights to terminate relevant services. If we charge you for the service, you can request refunds in reasonable proportion. The foregoing has set out all remedies available to you and all liabilities to be borne by us for such inconsistency. \u0009Notwithstanding any other provisions of this plan, we bear no liability or obligation for: (a) any amount exceeding the total service fees received by us hereunder (if any); (b) any cost and expense incurred for obtaining substitute goods, technologies, services or rights; (c) expense, expense increase or loss incurred due to the interruption or delay of the service or the damage or loss of data, whether based on this plan or any contract, negligence, strict liabilities or any other legal principle, even if we have received a prior notice about possibility of compensation for damages mentioned above. \u0009We will in no case be liable for any incidental, indirect or consequential damage or loss of profits. \u0009If laws of your country prohibit the exclusion or limitation of some liabilities by contract, then to the greatest extent prohibited by such laws, the above liability limitation or exclusion provisions shall not apply to you.
15. \u0009Plan changes \u0009Without prejudice to your material rights to enjoy the service, we reserve the rights to amend the provisions of this plan as necessary. We will provide a reasonably prior notice of any amendment to this plan via (a) webpage announcement; (b) e-mail; (c) push service and/or (d) SMS, etc. Please read the latest version of this plan at http://lenovomm.com (or any other website provided by us) from time to time to learn about any amendment. If you do not accept any amendment to this plan, please cancel and cease your use of the service before such amendment comes into force. If you do not cease your use of the service, you should use the service in accordance with the provisions of the amended plan.
16. \u0009Termination; effects of termination \u0009 This plan shall become effective as of the agreed effective date until it is terminated by either party. \u0009 Upon the termination of this plan due to the expiry of its term or for any other reason, the [Intellectual property rights], [Limited warranties], [Limitation of liabilities], [Information collection and privacy protection] and [Termination; effects of termination] and other provisions of this plan that shall survive based on their nature shall survive and remain in force and effect until they have been fully performed.
17. \u0009Construction of the plan \u0009If any provision of this plan is held invalid or unenforceable in whole or in part for whatever reason, the parties hereto shall replace such provision with a provision that can best reflect the intention of such invalid or unenforceable provision, and the remaining provisions of this plan shall remain valid and binding. This plan shall constitute the complete plan between the parties hereto on the subject matter of this plan and other relevant matters, and will supersede any prior plan or representation on your use of this service. The headings herein are inserted only for convenience and shall not affect the construction of this plan. If there is any inconsistency between this plan and Lenovo Account Registration Plan, this plan shall prevail.
18. \u0009Assignment of the plan \u0009We may assign or subcontract this plan in whole or in part at any time with or without prior notice for the purpose of achieving or providing better services. You shall not assign this plan or any part hereof to any other person. Any assignment made by you shall be null and void. You shall not assign your rights to use this service or any part of this service to any other person, whether permanently or temporarily.
19. \u0009No third-party beneficiary \u0009This plan shall only inure to the benefit of you and us and shall not inure to the benefit of any other persons other than the permitted successors or assignees.
20. \u0009Governing law \u0009This plan shall be concluded and construed in accordance with the applicable laws of the mainland of the People's Republic of China (excluding Hong Kong and Macau). Any disputes and conflicts arising from or in connection with the performance and interpretation of this plan shall be submitted to a court having jurisdiction at the place where we domicile for ruling.
21. \u0009Trademark notice \u0009Legend, Lenovo and other logos of Lenovo are trademarks or registered trademarks of Lenovo (Beijing) Limited or its affiliates in mainland China and/or other countries. Other products, trade names and trademarks referred to herein are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. Any reference of such products, trade names and trademarks is only for explanation and does not indicate any relevance between this service and these companies or organizations. We reserve all rights that are not expressly granted hereunder. "
